title: Impossible reorg, please file an issue
body:
#### System information

Geth version:  `geth-windows-amd64-1.6.6-10a45cb5.exe`  
OS & Version: Win 10
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

````

ERROR[07-01|10:16:22] Impossible reorg, please file an issue   oldnum=3958417 oldhash=17ce9b…56df50 newnum=3958417 newhash=17ce9b…56df50
````

Just doing what the app told me to do.

@fjl is this related to your changes in https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/14589 maybe ?
